articles.description: Being stunningly overlooked in the AFLW best and fairest won’t phase North Melbourne star Jasmine Garner, coach Scott Gowans says.
articles.content:
Being stunningly overlooked in the AFLW best and fairest wont phase North Melbourne star Jasmine Garner, coach Scott Gowans says.

articles.title: Why an October 25 grand final saves NRL another massive headache - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Some NRL stars would have had to renegotiate their club contracts if the season extended into November.
articles.content:

articles.description: Western Bulldogs star has premiership medal stolen
articles.content:
